name: Nightmares Demo
description:
Nightmares Demo is a demo/prototype using the UNITE2014 shooting tutorial as a base.  Development is still on-going, check back for progress!  Follow @Cleave_Games for updates and more info. Thanks!

Controls - 

  • W/A/S/D for movement
  • Left Mouse to fire your gun
  • Right Mouse to throw a grenade
  • Spacebar to open Upgrades Menu
  • Escape for Pause Menu
